content:
About me Yanto Chandra is a Full Professor at the City University of Hong Kong’s Department of Public and International Affairs, where he co-directs the Technology, Policy, and Law Lab. He is also a member of the Laboratory for Public Management and Policy.
Chandra’s research focuses on innovation and strategy in creating value and enhancing performance across the public and social sectors. This includes public sector innovation, digital government, citizen innovation, and new public algorithms (NPA). His projects in recent years examine citizens perceptions toward automation, particularly autonomous AI systems and blockchain, and what it means for better governance theory and practice. His work often applies computational social sciences, experiments (lab, online, field) and other computational methods.
summary: About me Yanto Chandra is a Full Professor at the City University of Hong Kong’s Department of Public and International Affairs, where he co-directs the Technology, Policy, and Law Lab. He is also a member of the Laboratory for Public Management and Policy.
